findings.title: Deployer can mint any new tokens after deployment
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to mint new tokens even after the contract's deployment.

findings.title: Deployer can burn or lock user funds
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to burn or lock user funds.

findings.title: Deployer can pause contract
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Owner can set buy/sell fees more than 25%
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to set buy and sell fees exceeding 25%, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can set max transaction limit
findings.description: The owner has the capability to set a maximum transaction limit, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.
